summary: Ever wished to see a new follower waiting right there for you in Breezehome ? Then ZimmerMan is your girl (Dont ask why I named her that pls)
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a Standlone Follower mod for a girl called ZimmerMan, dressed in Blade armour with a Daedric sword. She will level up. You may change her apperance in the CK if you wish and no mods are needed to run this mod. Please after using the mod, upload your images. She can be found in Breezehome in Whiterun.
I intend to give her missions but that will take a bit longer so I wanted to put her out there for now,for anyone who wants to pick her up until I can finish the missions.
author: Bloodqueen
